description: This file defines a UI component for a Results page in a Lightning.js application. It displays the quiz score and provides a restart button.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the Results page, including layout, initialization, and button handling logic.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the state with layout, theme, and text properties.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers child components used within this component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Retrieves and displays the user's quiz score from the router's state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the restart button's onPress handler to navigate back to the start.
